aboutme: Hello, My name is Netiwit Keawthong.  I'm 23 year old. I graduated from King Mongkut's University Of Technology North Bangkok, Majoring in Information Technology. I learn about network and programing. It make me have a good skill about network system and developer. Now I'm interested in programming. I have a basic skills and I'm ready to learn if there is a chance.
